[  {    "op": "add",    "path": "/project/rules/-",    "value": "Pills accidentally marked as taken can be undone."  }]
Describe the changes as an array of json patches. Do not include any narrative descriptions of the change either before or after. Just print the array of Json Patch Objects.

The array of JSON Patch objects representing the specified change is:

```
[
  {
    "op": "add",
    "path": "/project/rules/-",
    "value": "Pills accidentally marked as taken can be undone."
  }
]
``` 

This patch adds a new rule to the "project" object, specifically to the end of the "overallRules" array, that states pills accidentally marked as taken can be undone.
